subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] DEMON DISPELLED (GHOST ?) BY EXOTIC NEW TECHNOLOGY
author: Al Harris
full_text:
After a Catholic priest conducted a mass at our home (which is
haunted, apparently), we ran the TV throughout the day and night tuned
to EWTN, which broadcasts masses throughout the day, and it seemed to
help. During one of the priest's visits my wife and I experienced a
pronounced clearing of the air in the home, which resulted in a
"lifting" of the atmosphere. I believe these things help.

Al

On 12/7/09, Doc Stars <doc_starz@...> wrote:
> Can you let me know if the below is of interest to you folks?
>
> Something I thought would be of interest to most of our readers.
>
-- 
Al
